Summary: Cosmic ball of energy photographed after winning international award for a painting of 12/21/12 in Mayan symbolism
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There was one other sighting in Orlando on or around May 25th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson may 25, 2008 at the 2008 face and body art international convention in orlando, florida i won first place in the masters juried competition for face-painting (diana tenes, my sister, modeled) http:\\www.fabaic.com\ i asked for heavenly guidance and decided to paint a symbolic message. titled the ���mayan message��� this piece depicts the legendary serpent, quetzacoatl coming down from the heavens to renew the earth. the lower half is the mouth of the jaguar which according to the maya is the portal to the underworld or the other side. the message, ���in 12\21\12 the solar and the galactic planes will align. this is your invitation to connect and receive divine wisdom. make of habit of forgivness. it is not the end but the beginning of forever.��� in the hallway of the doubletree orlando about fifteen minutes after i won i was in a state of prayer. i had handed the camera to my 4 year old son, kai to take pictures and he started shooting before we were ready to pose. i did not realize the flash was off and almost erased this picture as i had the last 5 or 6 pictures before on the plane home when i noticed the ball. it is possible there were more but i'm glad i got this one. it was taken with a canon powershot a550, with the flash off. notice the reflection from the orb on my face and the jewels on my sister���s painted head and her bracelet. this is the actual photo untouched. it is still on my camera card. i believe this is a sign that my win was to share this message with the world. the anomaly is on my painting arm holding the award.
